website_summaries.verdict: A slightly shorter burn time than our budget pick but another high-quality bulk tea light option. Keep these on hand for atmospheric lighting around the home.
pros: Candles burn for about four hours
They are easy to light and don’t burn out early
Excellent quality control, all candles in a pack perform up to par
Sturdy wicks can be relit without trouble
Choose from packs of 25, 100, or 200 tea lights
cons: Some users say these candles produce a weak flame compared to other tea lights

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best!
customer_reviews.text: This is my FOURTH box from ZionJudaica. I go through a lot of tea candles. Candles are one of my nightly indulgence rituals. Having tried numerous providers of tea candles, the tea candles from ZJ are simply the best. Not only are they packed with great care, ship with great quickness, the candles burn the stated time time and in 375 candles, I have yet to experience a dud. I hope to be ordering these tea candles for the next 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: MarkDS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I Have tried many brands of tealights over the last few years & these are the very best! The others had so much waste or even burned out right away! I have used several of Zion Judaica's Tealight's & I am very happy with them! They have all burned perfectly & leave almost nothing! I have included a photo of one full tealight & 6 that I have burned. I would recommend these to anyone & purchase from them again, when I need more!
customer_reviews.author: Oregon Coast Gal

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: The individual tea lights are, well, average—not great, not horrible, a little bit flimsy, but mostly serviceable as tea lights. I will NEVER buy this product again, though, because of the completely daffy choice of packaging. Rather than package them in a cardboard box (easy to transport, easy to store, etc. etc.) the manufacturer chose to shrinkwrap these in clear plastic--open the plastic, and you have tea lights everywhere. A pain to transport, a pain to store. This is a virtuoso level of fail. This supremely poor choice of packaging turns an otherwise mediocre yet acceptable product into an unmitigated disaster.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. McGarry

customer_reviews.title: Able to re-light them with some reliability
customer_reviews.text: These have been pretty good. My biggest problem with tea-lights is not total "run time," but instead being able to re-light the candle multiple times. Tea-lights seem to be marketed primarily to maximize run-time. This results in candles with wicks that are so thin, that once you extinguish them, the wick is destroyed, disallowing the re-lighting of the candle. These Zion candles appear to have a decent wick, and I've been able to re-light them with some reliability.
customer_reviews.author: Boris Starosta

customer_reviews.title: Wicked good wicks
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order, no coupons, no discount, I willingly came back to give ‘em my money for their candles as they burn clean and steady for a good price. These candles can be blown out and re-lit many times over and the wick stands up to it, others don’t. Finally, seems like every time I find something good -rare these days- they go change it, well please don’t, do not change the wick in these, the packaging, the price, nothing, nada, do not change them and I’ll be back again ...
customer_reviews.author: Herb in PR

customer_reviews.title: Very Weak Flame
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tealights back in May and reordered in June. The first order I received was good. The tealights were hot enough to warm the essential oils in all three of my burners. The second order was junk. The flame is so weak that it does not heat the oils hot enough to release scent. I don't know if another supplier was used for the second order but I have about 100 tealights left that are absolutely useless for my oil burners. Is this bait and switch or just poor quality control? I will not order this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Kings

customer_reviews.title: Low flame, only burned half way
customer_reviews.text: I bought a package of 100 before, and found most would have such a little flame, none of the 3 different burners I used even melted the wax, most of the time. I used all 100 and bought another 100, thinking, "Maybe it was a bad batch". Wrong, the second batch was worse. They only burned half way through, the light was barely visible on 9 out of 10. It was a waste of money and I gave it 200 candles worth of trying, in 3 different burners. I will never buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: L. L.

customer_reviews.title: cleanest candles yet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my little 3 " oil diffuser. The candles were the prefect size for what I needed and I've been burning them since the day they came in the mail! I don't now if it lasted the entire 4.5 hours, but it was definitely one of the cleanest candles I've used for this specific purpose. For the price and quality I think it was fair. Shipping was quick and i will definitely order from here again. Mahalo for the efficiency and great product!
customer_reviews.author: Princess Buttercup

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: These tea lights are not as pictured. The picture depicts a full cup of wax. These are typical standard tealights BUT have a tiny flame. It won’t light up anything and doesn’t heat up a defuser at all. Don’t bother with these. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Liz W.

customer_reviews.title: These Work!
customer_reviews.text: OK - so, they're tealights -- what could go wrong with tea lights? Well, recently, I'm finding out ... many don't do what they should do. I've purchased 4hr and 6 hr lites and across the board if you blow them out - they will be wasted. The wick disappears. Unless you dig it out, it cannot be re-lit. Or, only the center burns, not the whole tealight. The Zion Judaica lights, however, burn well. They burn cleanly, so I don't feel congested after using them for a couple hours. Also, and best ... the wick is still there if I should decide to use them several evenings. I purchased these due to the reviews... and will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Rando

customer_reviews.title: Lasts longer than 4 hours
customer_reviews.text: I used the tealight candles for an outdoor wedding on a chilly mid-October evening. Before the event, I tested 3 candles indoors to see how long they last. It lasted almost 5 hours. At the wedding, they were lit at 5 pm. We blew them out close to 9 pm and still had maybe a good 30-45 minutes more life in them. These candles burned longer than I expected. I thought they were gonna die down faster outdoors with the cold and a bit of wind. I have never felt better being wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Kauaian Momma

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: They're exactly what I was hoping to receive. They are perfect for my scented oil warmer. They last 4 hours on average. Be gentle when removing them from the box as the tin is easily bent. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Agee

customer_reviews.title: Great tea lights
customer_reviews.text: Great tea lights, long burning and no smell. These a perfect for me to include with craft tealight holders I make and sell. I highly recommend. ***I order 3-500 products a year on Amazon prime, for personal and farm use. I've never been offered anything for a review, nor have I received anything after the fact. If this review was helpful, please give me a "thumbs up" it's what motivates me to keep writing! :-) ***
customer_reviews.author: SMR

customer_reviews.title: Will only buy this one
customer_reviews.text: I had tried tealight candles from Walmart and other places, they did not last long and didn't get burned all the way. I am so impressed with this set. I wait to use half of these 120 tealight candles then to write my review. NONE of them had half life. All of them were burned all the way, nothing left. A candle can be burned for 5 hours I think. I really love this set and think it is a great value. From now on, I will only buy this brand. Use it for fragrance oil warmer, works so well. I am so glad that I find this one. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Keither Selling

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: After reading the numerous five star reviews I have to assume I didn't receive the same quality tea lights. What I received hardly makes it to a 3 hr burn time and leaves a fair amount of un-melted wax. They do not give off a very bright flame so it almost useless in my warmer. Perhaps others received a better quality but for what I received I wouldn't recommend these. Unfortunately that leaves me to believe we are not all getting the same product.
customer_reviews.author: drake

customer_reviews.title: High quality, long burning tea lights.
customer_reviews.text: These are a high quality tea light in metal cups. They burned cleanly for about 4-5 hours. I'm becoming an expert in tea lights. I burn 12-15 a night during the winter, maybe double that if I replace candles when they burn out. I have a collection of crystal tea light/votive candle holders and I call them my "fireplace". They add warmth, both physically and esthetically to long winter nights. I place a little perfume oil on top of each one which adds a light personal scent adding to the ambience of the room. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ricracTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: special feature..
customer_reviews.text: these candles are exactly how & what they're supposed to be. *plus 3-4 of them lit & placed around a small room will make & keep you warm for 4+ hours! really. nice surprise -no need to turn on my space heater. no kidding. (i don't know about february but they've worked so far (in a wisconsin january). the lights are peaceful & beautiful & help to keep me focused & mindful. what more do you want?
customer_reviews.author: freepeltier

customer_reviews.title: Really high quality votive candles at a great price
customer_reviews.text: For religious reasons, I light tealight candles daily. I've tried several different kinds. These are really high quality tealight candles at a great price. They light easily and burn evenly. They also burn completely -- they don't just burn straight down the middle and then go out. I often have to blow out a candle and then re-light it later and that's easy to do with these tealights. Poorer quality tealights that I've bought are very hard to re-light later; they burn for a minute and then go out. If you need to buy tealight candles in quantity and you burn tealights frequently, this is a really, really good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Jaye Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Terrible tea lights
customer_reviews.text: These tea lights are terrible. I purchased them based on all of the good reviews but they are the worst tea lights we've ever had. The flame is so weak, it doesn't properly heat the essential oil in my oil burner, and if you put them in them in other candle holders, they do not emit much light. Would not recommend and will not buy again, they were a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: These are the worst!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used about 20 tealights by now, in a tealight holder, to keep my tea warm, and not a single one has burned longer than 30 minutes. After a very short time, the wick has burnt down and drown in the melting wax. Don't buy these, absolutely sub-par quality!
customer_reviews.author: Gerda

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a great value for the money. I took off a star because it seems they really underfill the tin with wax, which of course reduces burn time. I wouldn’t give as a gift but that’s personal preference. I use these alongside scented tea lights to keep from overpowering a room with scent but maintaining the warmth of the room by having more tealights lit. Right now, these go in lantern style tea light holder and light up the lantern perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: I love these candles!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a source for GOOD tea lights for years! So many places you have one of two choices - they are affordable but low quality or they are expensive and questionable quality. As a result I burn more votives and pillars. When I saw these I thought I'd take a chance. The reviews were good and it seemed worth a shot. They arrived right away. They are extremely well packaged. They burn clean and bright. I highly recommend them to you and I just ordered two more packs to keep on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Lover of Catholic books

customer_reviews.title: Great tea lights!
customer_reviews.text: Of all the candles I've bought over the years, these ones burn for the longest time--3.5 to 5 (yes, 5!) hours burn time; average is 4+ hours. These are not extra large tea lights either. They are normal size, maybe even a tiny bit smaller. I was skeptical when purchasing these, as a number of reviews had stated the burn time was less than an hour. Glad I took a chance. These tea lights have been perfect as my Shabbos candles every Friday. Odorless, no wax left behind and long burn time. What more can you ask for from a tea light?
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy another... As long as they never change how they make this product! I am a massage therapist and especially at Halloween I use a lot of tea lights! I use to buy from BB&B but lately they have SUCKED! This is a quality product that burns well even if I have to blow out and re-light the next day! The tins are completely to almost completely empty when I pitch them! (And the only time I've thrown away with any wax in them is if I failed to trimmed the wick so it doesn't bury itself!)
customer_reviews.author: J. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Genuinely Long Burning
customer_reviews.text: These tea light candles are great; they really do burn for quite some time, cleanly and very evenly. I use these daily, and find I go through them much slower than other brands* I've tried. I'll definitely re-order when the time comes. (*The last set of tea light candles were a pack I bought at Ikea, and they burned pretty funky; the wax melted only near the wick, what remained was literally chunky and kind of gross to look at, and the burn time was very short. I went through the bag very quickly, and that purchase just seemed very wasteful all around.)
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Shine bright
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely my favorite brand of tea lights I’ve bought . I have tried many different brands and scents as I burn these almost nightly and these are the ONLY candles I’ve bought that don’t disappoint they are true to the burn time packaged nicely every time. They give great light off I’ve used some that hardly give a flame. I can’t say enough great things. I appreciate the consistency of service here I’ve ordered at least 10 times and same results . Would highly recommend trying these!
customer_reviews.author: Jamielee Adams

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: Positives: the one that actually stayed lit for more than a couple of seconds looked nice. Negatives: -some of them burned right through the container and left wax circles on my counters (out of 120, this happened to about 3 of the candles) -some of them burned out after like 1 minute -takes a bit of time to light (about 5-8 seconds of continued flame exposure)
customer_reviews.author: AI91

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE! I don’t expect that much from tea lights. Just to burn nicely in place. About 75% of the time I burn these, they are barely barely lit. They burn terribly. I have bought tea lights from the dollar store that burned much better. Of course, when I decided to finally return them, the refund date had passed. I do NOT recommend these. Save your money and go to Walmart or the dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I burn 2-3 a day
customer_reviews.text: They never disappointed. I've had other "cheap" candles like this that simply fell apart. These hold up well. Due to packaging I dump them in giant ziplock bags and have yet to have a flake. They burn relatively forever. They're candles so not much so say but, good candles for the price.
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: I am a returning customer, because they are the best.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these in 2016. When I ran out at the end of 2018 (early '19?) I didn't go back through my order history, I just ordered another brand. The other brand candles don't last as long AND what I really like about the Zion candles is that they burn completely. No wasted wax. The other brand leaves about 1/8th wax residue. Maybe more. I don't write many reviews, but I liked these enough to save someone else the headache. Get these, then buy them again, don't stray!
customer_reviews.author: TMWaddington

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: I'd purchased from a different vendor who claimed to have long-lasting tealight candles and was disappointed, but this product really does the job. I light the candles when I get up - pretty early! - and it's just a pleasure to have them still burning later on - and available to light again the next morning. No more constantly dashing back to the cupboard for a new candle. Thank you for a quality product that does what you said it would.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Bate

customer_reviews.title: Burn for about 4-5 hours with no mess or smoke, strong wicks.
customer_reviews.text: These tealight candles came packaged well in a plastic bag in neat rows so no candles were crushed. Wicks are thick and strong and go down to the bottom. Candles burned for approx. 5 hours each for the 30 I have used so far. Most burned down right to the bottom to expose clean aluminum, but some got blown out by wind as they were placed outdoors. They are easy to relight. There was absolutely no smoke as they burned and no crackle and pop that leads me to believe they're made of good paraffin wax. I was pleased with this purchase, and will be re-ordering once I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Zen

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, easy to light, great value
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad to see these available again--I just ordered a pack for the second time. I use them mostly in a coffeepot warmer, so the coffee I brew in the morning is still nice and warm in the afternoon. These candles usually last 6 or 7 hours. Unlike some others brands, if I blow one out before it's finished burning, it's easy to relight the next day. This is a quality candle at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Allegretti, D.Vet.Hom.

customer_reviews.title: All the wicks are stuck in the wax
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to beat the price, but when you have to bend 120 wicks out of the wax in order to light the candle, its REALLY annoying. And if you don't fully bend the wick properly, the candle lights for a few minutes, then dies, then you have to try and re-bend the wick again while you are navigating the hot wax. Personally, I would have paid 2x the cost if the wicks didn't need to be fixed before lighting.
customer_reviews.author: I buy too much on Amazon

customer_reviews.title: They burn great!
customer_reviews.text: I am a repeat buyer of the Zion unscented tea lights because they burn 4-5 hours neatly. I have never had a problem with them. They come packaged well, and the wax melts evenly. This is why I keep buying them!! Plus the price is great too! I use tarts daily in my home so these tea lights are used daily. Thank you Amazon for a great product at a great price. Will be buying more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor G. Pastore

customer_reviews.title: Great Tealights!
customer_reviews.text: I had done my research on theses tealights and they received a very good rating, so I decided to order them. They arrived very well packaged and after testing them out, they burned easily for 5 hours. I am very pleased and will order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amethyst228

customer_reviews.title: Good deal. They work fine
customer_reviews.text: Overall I just wanted these so I could melt them a bit and add my own essential oils- it works ok but not as well as I’d like (scent wise). I find they last maybe up to 4 hrs at the most, they don’t smoke like some other cheap candles, and so far I haven’t had any issues with them not staying lit. It’s a decent deal for the quantity and would likely purchase again- wish they had with some nice scents though.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa M. Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your $$ on these!
customer_reviews.text: The tea lights I received look nothing like the picture that is shown for this product. They're cheaply made and they don't stay lit. I have a little scented wax burner that I've used for years and never had problems using it. The tea lights I was sent burn so dimly that it doesn't even melt the scented wax in the burner. Very low quality, very poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda

customer_reviews.title: A little better packaging would save the top layer of tea lights from being dented or damaged.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you paid for I guess. I intersperse these with scented tea lights. The top layer of these tea lights were dented around the edges of the tin holders. No biggie I guess, they're going to end up melted. But a little better packaging like even a top layer of cardboard over the shrink wrap would prevent that. They last about 3 hours. Adequate.
customer_reviews.author: RLJComm

customer_reviews.title: Best Tea Light Candles I've Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: These have arrived in perfect condition, with no nicks or dents, unlike some of the other cheaper qualities that I used to order before. Also, they light for longer than advertised, and most importantly, if I blow them out, they relight! Some of the cheaper ones don't relight, so basically, if you blow them out, they're done! This is a repeat order, because I was so happy with the first batch, and as before, they've arrived in perfect condition!
customer_reviews.author: Anita M

customer_reviews.title: Good bargain.
customer_reviews.text: At nearly 10 cents apiece, these are a bargain. However, mine do not look like the ones pictured. The pictures show the top of the candle to be convex at the top, whereas mine are concave, giving the appearance that the tin is not as full of wax as it could be. Regardless, I'm happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Day

customer_reviews.title: Not much burn time and you can't relight!!!
customer_reviews.text: These tea lights don't have much of a burn time (much less than advertised). If you do happen to want to stop the burn, you can't light it again. I have been using and burning tea lights for years. If you blow them out when they still have life left in them...forget it. You can't relight. I am very sorry I bought this item. If I can get a refund that would help. Would gladly send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly L.

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: These are the best tea light candles ! They have a long burning time and light easily. This may sound silly, but I bought a cheap brand at a bargain store and they wouldn’t even stay lit half the time! I use them in my wax burners and other votives...love them. This is my second purchase, well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kpr

customer_reviews.title: They are constantly good candles.
customer_reviews.text: I purchase these tea light candles all the time. They have no scent, burn well and I'll continue to purchase them. They are also at a very good price. Out of the hundreds + I've burned, only one or two didn't burn right - had wax left in metal container. They are shipped well enough for what they are. No breakage or damage ever.
customer_reviews.author: Signa Z.

customer_reviews.title: Everything is good except they leak
customer_reviews.text: Everything about these tea lights is good except for the fact they leak. I'm happy with the light given off and length of time they burn. I use these in a votive holder so I don't care too much that the melted wax leaks out a little. I had one on my counter and the wax scraped right off so it wasn't a big deal, but I definitely would not use these on a coffee table I cared about. I would have liked to return them but I used too many in a votive holder before discovering they leak.
customer_reviews.author: Hayleigh

customer_reviews.title: Great Tealights
customer_reviews.text: I really like these tealights. I've purchased bagged ones from Wal-Mart and they are hard to light, they don't stay lit and the tin container isn't very sturdy. These tealights light very easily, they stay lit and the container is a bit sturdier. My only complaint is that they didn't come in a box. That was one thing that swayed me to purchases these. They came wrapped in cellophane which means they don't stay neatly together. The pros definitely outweigh the con though. I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Jan T.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: These candles came exactly as expected. I read the other reviews, so I knew that the packaging would not be 100% protective. For the most part, the candles are in perfect condition. A few on the edges got bent a little. Product still works the same. I wouldn't give them as a gift because some were bent, but they are great for my own use at home.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Kindt

customer_reviews.title: Insightful tealights
customer_reviews.text: Love these tea lights which have a long burn time of 3-4 hours, burning down to their metal tab. I find they are better than their soy and beeswax cousins that are far expensive. Soy tea lights I have found do not burn down. I have found these lights will burn all the way to the bottom and not sputter out midway. Very pleased with product.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and molded to promote even melting
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality tea lights, they even have a small indentation around the wick for good burning and letting the wax melt without running down the sides. A small detail but very helpful. The candles have no scent and burn evenly. You can't ask more from a tea light. I use these not only in Scandinavian-style votives for the table, but also under my teapot for keeping warm.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna D.

customer_reviews.title: Tealight Candles burn for 3 1/2 hours!
customer_reviews.text: These candles arrived quickly and are packaged in plastic. I couldn't believe the number for the price, and thought they might not last very long. WRONG! I timed a candle, which lights very quickly. It burned for 3 1/2 hours, with perfect flame. There is no odor or soot, so they are perfect for aroma therapy. They are lovely tea candles.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon West

customer_reviews.title: Oh my.......finally a quality, affordable tea light.
customer_reviews.text: What a delight it was to open up my package of tea lights and see the quality and precision with which they are made. Yes, the are more expensive than the gazillion tea lights you can buy at IKEA. The fact of the matter is that you end up throwing away many of those tea lights because of the shoddy quality. So light your Zion Judaica tea light with pride and know that they will perform up to all of your expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer24

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! I’ve burned about 20 of these so far and I like them over any other tealight candles I have purchased. Most tealights seem to burn too quickly and then don’t burn all the way down, leaving about a centimeter or 2 or wax still in the tin. That drives me mad! These have a great burn time, about 2 hours, and they burn all the way down! I will definitely be ordering these bad boys again.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay R. Shultz

customer_reviews.title: Good candles that burn a decent amount of time.......like them.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy about these. They're in thin aluminum that came pretty well packaged but did suffer a few pretty banged-up candles - still can use them. I've burned half a dozen so far & each burn for between 4 & 4.5 hours as stated in the ad. Price is fair. I'd buy them again. Thank you! Updated 2-8-16: purchased these again and they didn't arrive banged-up, not one bit. Last 4-5 hours and for the price it's still a bargain and better than so many others. I prefer soy but they are just too expensive. These do the job beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Marie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Long lasting Light
customer_reviews.text: Finally getting to review this product. I had to use the rest of other tealights... Which leads to the review. These tealights are great! Easy to light, consistent flame, and very long lasting (especially compared to the former different brand). They are as advertised-last about 4 hours. I am quite happy with them and highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Belalinda

customer_reviews.title: So so for now...
customer_reviews.text: I use them for my tea warmer. Sometimes it stays at the right temp but seems to take a long time getting there so it’s only effective the last half or so. Not sure if I want it to last longer or not...ideally it would be nice as I drink all day, but it prolly isn’t good for me. 😂
customer_reviews.author: Sueso

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Based on the good reviews, I got these to use for memorial candles and am pleased to find out that they do the job nicely. Have used them a few days now, they stay lit and burn all the way down for about 4 to 6 hours. Cotton wicks, no scent of any kind, just long lasting clean burning wax. It was a good deal, am happy with this purchase and recommend them, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: ShastaGirl

customer_reviews.title: they go out constantly
customer_reviews.text: ive used half the package, While a good price many are hard to light and wicks do not seem to be installed tight. One in every four will not light correctly and many will go out while they are barely burning. Dont know if its a manucature problem but i would have to buy another brand after the experience with these. I didnt give to much thought to the quality as they are only tealights.
customer_reviews.author: Bjlaskey

customer_reviews.title: Great burning power
customer_reviews.text: I really like these tealights as they burn through the very last bit of wax, unlike so many others that stop burning with half the wax still pooled around the wick. Most of the time I am even able to re-light the tealight, if it is only partially burned. Most other tealight brands I used before will not burn after being re-lit, if not fully used up. Good value for a good product!
customer_reviews.author: Anett

customer_reviews.title: Burns Very Low
customer_reviews.text: They burn extremely low. there is a space around the wick that is larger than normal so that might be why. I use mine in a wax warmer so they really do not work for that. I would say about 3/4 of them are like that. I will pay a few more dollars for a better quality next time.
customer_reviews.author: Heath Chancey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect burning Tea Lights
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised not only by the cheap price but more importantly, as someone who uses tea lights offer that these lasted up to 5 hours and burnt down perfectly, leaving no waste unlike many other tea lights. Amazon Basics is a trustworthy name that I know I'm always going to get a quality product for a more than reasonable price! Thank you Amazon! I highly recommend these if you often burn candles or just need trustworthy candles for emergency!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Glackin

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love these.
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews on these tealights and really thought I was going to get something special. The first one I lit went out in the first hour. No drafts, it just stopped burning, had to relight it. After using these over the last few days, I actually like my .99 cent store tealights better.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri S

customer_reviews.title: Not quality, you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: So, I like there is no scent due to my asthma. I looked for something without a scent. However when I took one out of package the tea light fell apart, metal fell off and wick fell out. If I was looking for quality I would have returned. You get what you pay for. It works for what I want.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany P.

customer_reviews.title: Candles good, shipping bad
customer_reviews.text: These are your typical unscented tealight candles. I have no fault with the candles themselves. But they were shipped to me in a bag so all the little metal cups are squished around the edges. They appear usable so I will keep them but I will probably not order from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Packaging not so great, candles burn down much faster than normal
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be sealed in a few bags for easy storage, but you have to cut their vacuum seal to get to the candles and you end up with a bunch of loose candles to try and figure out how to store. They burn ok, but much faster than the ones we were using before. Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JetBay

customer_reviews.title: Very good... also slightly smaller/taller
customer_reviews.text: They are just tea light candles, but do seem to be a bit better than what I have purchased previously. Also, important to me... the circumference is slightly smaller... if you have a holder (such as mine, vintage, photo attached) that requires a smaller tea light, than this may work for you. Other brand(s) won't quite fit (see last photo). They are also just as slightly taller so I think burn time about the same. Both brands had about the same amount of unused wax at end. In my first photo, this brand is on the right, & other brand on left. I will buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Delilah M.

customer_reviews.title: Only last about One Hour
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased these twice. My 22yo Son passed away November 2016. I light a candle for him every night. The first pack I used, they were great. All candles lasting about 4-5 hours, consistently. I've used about 10 from the package I just received and the candles are not as good as the first package. Out of 10, only about 4 of them lasted 3-4 hours. The rest only lasted ONE HOUR. I am very disappointed with the new set of candles I received. I definitely feel a candle should last longer than one hour.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Long-lasting and easy to light
customer_reviews.text: These tea candles work exceptionally well -- much better than other brands I've tried. They light easily and last for hours. We frequently use them during dinner (we have some lovely translucent candle holders they fit in) and these will last for three or four evenings. Other brands we've tried will usually last for only one evening and are very difficult to light. I will certainly be purchasing more of these candles in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Voyant

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in these candles
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've ordered this brand of tea candles and I am very disappointed in them. When I light the wick, it almost immediately goes out and I have to work and work to finally get it to stay lit. I won't be purchasing them again.
customer_reviews.author: JanS

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: These tea lights are perfect and unscented. Although I ordered them for use as Shabbat candles, they came just in time to provide light for a long power outage. They are a good value for a quantity of 120. The tea lights burn fully and leave no residue.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B.

customer_reviews.title: Good price for number of tea light candles but shorter
customer_reviews.text: Great value for number of tea light candles. Candles are shorter than normal tea light candles
customer_reviews.author: Serendipity

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful glow!
customer_reviews.text: I use these tealights in various candle holders. At first I didn't care for the stark white wax and the chintzy metal holders, but when lit, the candles burn bright and beautiful, casting a warm glow -- and you don't even notice the metal holders. They are long-lasting and clean burning, too, which is very nice! GREAT value -- Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Erinn M.

customer_reviews.title: If. You don’t need them long they work if you do don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: They didn’t last very long used for my aunts candle light vigil and they didn’t last the whole time
customer_reviews.author: Meleah Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, just like we are used to. Burns consistently and is a nice size.
customer_reviews.text: These were packaged well and arrived just as expected. They fit in all of our tea candle holders, and they burn for just the right amount of time. We haven't timed how many hours these burn for, but we get about the same amount of time from these as we do from any tea candles we've bought from a store. Great price for the quantity, and will definitely be buying more when we need to!
customer_reviews.author: Raffi

customer_reviews.title: Good deal in pricing, and good quality. I'll buy again for sure
customer_reviews.text: Much better deal buying these in bulk here then the ones at Wal-Mart. They last longer. I use a lot of these at my home altar. I'll keep buying on Amazon because people in my town don't care to shop wearing a mask and don't keep their distance.
customer_reviews.author: Marques68

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with these long-burning tea lights!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical when ordering these tea lights because I've been burned in the past, so to speak, but I was pleasantly surprised! They burned evenly and for about five hours — definitely the longest of the online candles I've purchased. I will definitely order these in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used tealights for a long time, and these are really good. Not the cheapest, but definitely not expensive. They burn right down to the bottom and burn for 3-4 hours depending on circumstances. Also they don’t come with all those wax crumbles. I will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Maher

customer_reviews.title: Only great for decoration !
customer_reviews.text: It last at least 3 hours. Of course it's unscented, says it in the description. But if you just wanna light candles for the vibe this is great for like a a special night or so. If your like me and needed something for the candle wax burner thing I do t think you should get it. You would have to use 2-3 of this to get it to fully melt the wax above.
customer_reviews.author: Rima

customer_reviews.title: I can't keep them lit
customer_reviews.text: Even when they do stay lit, they burn for maybe 30 minutes at very, very low heat with hardly any flame. I tried about 20 before I realized that they just don't work very well. I am throwing them away. They are that unfunctional.
customer_reviews.author: J F

customer_reviews.title: Slightly Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I use quite a few tea lights not only for ambiance but also for wax scents. I have always bought them at a leading retailer and have always been satisfied. You would think a tea light is a tea light but I am disappointed in the lighting of the wicks with these. You cannot just light and place in your holder. You have to make sure with these that they stay lit since the flame tends to diminish without fully lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A.

customer_reviews.title: The flame
customer_reviews.text: There's not too much to like about a tiny candle when the wick burns too hot & melts down the center leaving you with a wasted money feeling. These candles do not do that! They have a lovely flame, burn brightly & use themselves up...just like we all should :)
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outdoor mini-luminaria
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for project for our son in which he was using these to make outdoor "mini-luminaria"...these fit perfectly into 2 oz fluted white paper water drinking cups which protected the candles from blowing out in the wind. The intensity of the candle light was great, shining thru the white paper cups. He was able to arrange the luminaria in the form of large letters to spell out easily legible words from a distance. The candles are long-burning, burn very cleanly, and he had not trouble lighting them---that was a feat, since he was using 200+ in his project!....Great and speedy vendor service. Will order again!
customer_reviews.author: ceebee

customer_reviews.title: Great Product but Packaging Not Good
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal with a great product the really last which is impressive for tea lights. But when I received them the packaging was all busted and some of the tea lights were loose in the box and had gotten damaged but otherwise great product.
customer_reviews.author: T Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: What a Great Product
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to dislike about this product. I will always buy these tea lights when I need more. I put them around my house at Christmas time and lit them before the guests arrived around 5 pm. At 11 pm some were still burning. I have read a few negative reviews and I don’t know how anyone could even think of complaining about this product. What a great value for you money. I would recommend them to anyone I know
customer_reviews.author: Paul P

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these tea lights for table decorations for my daughter's wedding. I lit two and timed their burn time. It was 3 hours and 57 minutes. At the wedding some actually were still burning after the 4 hour mark. They do melt completely to a clear wax but continue to burn. When they go out, the metal container is completely empty. I would buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Kathief

customer_reviews.title: Longer than 4 hours
customer_reviews.text: They came very fast and were packaged with care. Every single candles in perfect condition, and they burn a little more than four hours and they don’t smoke at all, they’re very clean burning.
customer_reviews.author: Tino

customer_reviews.title: Burn well and long
customer_reviews.text: These candles burn well. The wicks remain standing even after the candles are blown out, so relighting is a breeze. I lit them for a dinner party, where they burned about 3 hours, then blew them out. They have about half of their life left.
customer_reviews.author: SandraL

customer_reviews.title: Uses all wax, but doesn't burn hot.
customer_reviews.text: These do burn all the way down and last longer than normal tealight, so I am happy that I don't seem to waste as much wax. The main issue: they do not burn hot at all!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: Good quality candles
customer_reviews.text: These are unscented and exactly as described. They burn for 3 to 4 hours which is really nice - other brands that I’ve bought have sometimes only lasted for an hour!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Zion Judaica tealights
customer_reviews.text: Tea lights burn for 4 hours at minimum. Burn all the way down, no wax left after burning. I would recommend this product. Performs as described.
customer_reviews.author: vernon shelton

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: I got these because I use lots of tea candles and this is cheaper than buying individual packages at the local dollar store. They arrived with no damage, they last long and they were exactly what I expected and wanted. I will order again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: BURNS WAAAY LONGER
customer_reviews.text: OMG! These burn soo long, much longer than a tea light from Target. I was tired of making a trip to Target and find out they are out. They are always out of stock. BUT, These are far superior and I will never have to run an errand to Target ever again!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: The candles are o.k., but the package was ripped and the most of the candles were all out rolling in the box. Luckily nothing was broken, but disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long Burning
customer_reviews.text: These are unscented tealights which is what I wanted considering I use them to burn scented tarts. I thought for the price they would be cheap but they're not. They burn for a few hours and for the quantity it comes with they're bound to last a while!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal! Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking to purchase some tea lights in bulk, I highly rec these. I was so afraid since there were so many, some would certainly be damaged. NOT ONE CANDLE IS DAMAGED. They are packed in tightly, preventing shift during shipping and arrived in perfect shape. Great candle for oil burners and just to keep in case of power outage during a storm. Def will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Powell

customer_reviews.title: not consistent
customer_reviews.text: the first time these burned great! no wax left behind... BUT the second box i ordered, however, a lot of wax was left over and not nearly as good as the first ones. :(
customer_reviews.author: Lo

customer_reviews.title: Love Em!
customer_reviews.text: Since I don't live too close too a Big Lots anymore this is awesome to be able to buy a big bag of tealights. This is my second bag ordered and these guys rock. Depending on how you burn them defines the burning time. In a lantern they can go around 5 hours. But in and votive ar or burner with alot of oxygen, then it might burn around 4 hours. I am a candle freak so I will continue to buy these and definitely recommend! 😉
customer_reviews.author: Short Beard

customer_reviews.title: Will burn for a long time
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! I have purchased those types of candles many times however they did not last long enough for me to enjoy them. Those are burning atlases 4 hours, so if you light them when it’s bright outside they will last till darkness. They are uscented. Perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Ola Boom

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Comparing to the another brand of tea candle, they don’t burn as bright or last as long. Why? Thinner wick and less of a candle...whatever that means, but they don’t burn as bright or as long.
customer_reviews.author: KBChicago

customer_reviews.title: small tea lights
customer_reviews.text: They are a bit smaller than the old tea lights I have. The metal holder fits within the old tea light holders I have. That said, they are fine, and I have tea lights to last me until I die. They burn cleanly, without smoke or odor.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Kaul

customer_reviews.title: Tiny and mighty!
customer_reviews.text: I simply, in the Winter months, simply must have candle light! And a cluster of these fit that bill! Use your imagination .... it’s impossible to go wrong or make a mistake with these extraordinary little critters! Trust me, I’ve been around the candle block many, many times! Silvia Wolfson
customer_reviews.author: Silvia Wolfson

product_meta.title: Zion Judaica Quality Tealight Candles Unscented Set of 120 - Stark White
product_meta.description: Size:120 PackPackage of 120 clean burning unscented Tealight candles in a self-standing aluminum tin. With these quality Tealights you can enjoy the warm glow of a fine candle while enjoying the maximum safety of the tea light candle. If youre a restaurant, party planner or just enjoy dining to the romantic touch of tealites, these quality long burning boughies (in French) will deliver the ultimate and lasting radiation of warmth. European made with a special technique to prevent early burn out of your TeaLights. Tea Lights are an efficient and inexpensive, cost effective form of candle lighting for your ritual and religious ceremonies of Shabbat and Holidays. Universal size of tall x 1.5 diameter. Burns nice and clean to the last drop for 4-4.5 hours. "WARNING" Never leave burning candle unattended. Keep 2 inches between candles. Put candles on fireproof objects only.
feature_bullets: 120 UNSCENTETED PURE WHITE long burning tealight candles come neatly & tightly stacked & protectively shrink-wrapped.
LEAD FREE 100% COTTON WICK that will absorb the 100% paraffin and produce a bright, warm glowing & smokeless flame.
WARM GLOWING FLAMES for more tea-light for your buck, will keep your tea pot warm and add extra ambiance to your party.
QUALITY EUROPEAN PRODUCT Zion Judaica’s famous candles are made of only the finest pure paraffin in a completely automated production.
PERFECT BURN TIME of 4-4.5 hours, this is the most common desired burn length to last for your entire event. Little to no wax will remain when candles are done burning.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars5,114 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
